description:
Warm, wool blend fabric and a snug fit make these gloves a just-right layer for multi-day trekking or shorter hikes that might get windy and cool. Touchscreen feature helps with map reading or capturing photos and the silicone print on the fingers helps you grip your gadgets.

  • Made of a knit blend of wool, polyester and nylon bonded to a fleece inner
  • Motion Wrap® construction moves seams away from palm for better dexterity
  • Touchscreen compatible silicone finger tabs provide enhanced grip and tactility
  • Leather grab tab on inner wrist allows glove to be pulled on easily
name: Outdoor Research Flurry Sensor Gloves - Youths
